statements: SELECT * FROM sales_data;

SELECT sale_id, product_name FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;

SELECT product_name, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT sale_date, SUM(sale_amount) as total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY sale_date;

SELECT product_name, sale_date FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sale_date DESC, product_name;

SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE product_name LIKE '%shirt%' AND sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-04-30';
SELECT sales_id, product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data JOIN customers ON sales_data.sales_id = customers.customer_id WHERE sale_amount < 5000 ORDER BY sales_id ASC, customer_name DESC;

SELECT customer_name, sales_amount FROM sales_data JOIN customers ON sales_data.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE sales_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, city, country FROM customers WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_sales > 5;

SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
